BBDP1.M.DE.N.VPI.C.A00000.I15.L: Consumer price index / Germany / Unadjusted figure / Overall index
BBDP1.M.DE.Y.VPI.C.A00000.I15.L: Consumer price index / Germany / Calendar and seasonally adjusted / Overall index

BBDP1.M.DE.N.VPI.C.A00000.I15.L: General: Territorial definition: western Germany up to 1994 (without Saarland up to 1959 and without West Berlin up to1961), thereafter Germany (chain-linked via January 1995).  Up to 1961: price index for the standard of living of four-person households of workers and salaried staff with an average income, 1962-99: price index for the standard of living of all households, as of 2000: consumer price index
BBDP1.M.DE.Y.VPI.C.A00000.I15.L: Source: Seasonal adjustment based on data provided by the Federal Statistical Office
